name: Lofi Radio ~ Gameboy Beats to Chill/Study to
name_original: Lofi Radio ~ Gameboy Beats to Chill/Study to
description: This point and click game is an interactive lofi radio on a GB rom! The radio in the game will cycle through 8 songs but you can also manually change the song. Point and click on the artwork to change the background. You can also read books or play with the fish. Have this running in your emulator or original hardware while you chill/study.
